node1.PC_Text: Can you swing by the cafeteria?
Can you show me your paycheck?

A.PC_Text: Can you make sure it has staples in it?
This stapler is such a pretty color. Can I keep it?

B.PC_Text: When you go, could you grab me a coffee?
Could you go sooner? I'm fading fast and the only thing that can revive me is 50cc of caffeine, stat.
B.NPC_Response: I guess I could leave a bit sooner.

B.PC_Text: I need you to go now. I think I'm dying from caffeine withdrawal.

C.PC_Text: Would you mind showing me your paycheck? I have some questions about mine.
C.NPC_Response: That sounds like a Human Resources issue.

C.PC_Text: Can't you let me just take a peek?
C.NPC_Response: Annie, that's personal information. I don't think this request is appropriate.

C.PC_Text: I need to know how much you get paid so I know what to ask for when I ask for a raise.
C.NPC_Response: Isn't it a bit premature to be thinking about a raise?

AA.PC_Text: Great, thanks! I'll return it as soon as I'm done.
Great. I'll return it sometime later today.
Oh, those are the boring regular staples? Don't you have the pretty shiny purple ones? Those are my favorite to staple with.
AA.NPC_Response: Sorry, no. Just regular ol' staples.

AB.PC_Text: Thanks! Don't want to get to my desk and have to come back for staples.
I hate putting staples in. I always worry I'm going to staple my fingers together.
I like to pretend staplers are alligators and I am a zookeeper feeding them staples.
AB.NPC_Response: I've never thought about it that way.

AC.PC_Text: Not forever, just for the next hour or so.
Not forever, just the next week or so.
Could you give me the receipt for the stapler so I can go buy the exact same kind? It's just so pretty!
AC.NPC_Response: I don't have that on hand.

BA.PC_Text: I don't have any cash on me, but I'll pay you back tomorrow. Promise!

BB.PC_Text: I don't actually know how much 50cc's is, but can you get me that coffee that comes in the big red cup with an M on it?
Thank you, nurse Fran. Because of you, this patient will live to see another day.

BC.PC_Text: You're probably right - I should just do it myself.
I can't. I hurt my ankle jumping on my bed this morning. Pretty please?
I got locked in a haunted cafeteria once when I was a kid, and I've been scared of them ever since.

CA.PC_Text: If I write my questions down, can you take them to Human Resources next time you're nearby?

CB.PC_Text: You're probably right, Fran. I'll figure it out some other way.
CB.NPC_Response: You should talk to Human Resources about it.

CB.PC_Text: But we're best friends, right? We share everything!
But I know lots of personal things about you. Like your favorite color, home address, and social secuirty number.
CB.NPC_Response: How could you possibly know that?!

CC.PC_Text: Maybe you're right.  I should probably wait a full week before asking.

CC.NPC_Response: That is not what that saying means.

CC.PC_Text: You're right, what was I thinking? I haven't even brought in baked goods yet. Gotta set the mood first!
CC.NPC_Response: I don't think that's going to help.
